alert.note: Alert for Greeley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 11:59PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Greeley County through 1230 AM CDT... At 1159 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Ericson to Greeley to near Wolbach. Movement was northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Spalding around 1210 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for central Nebraska.
